name: Mug Macaroni and Cheese
instructions: 1. In a large microwavable mug or large bowl add in the macaroni and the water. You need a large mug as the water will boil up.
2. Microwave for roughly 3 Â½ minutes. You want the pasta to be fully cooked.
3. Pour off the remaining cooking water.
4. Stir in the milk, cornstarch and shredded cheese and microwave for a final 60 seconds to create your sauce. Stir well, season with salt and pepper and enjoy.
